sentences.en: " Have it your own way,'she said. " Come on, Jordan. "
sentences.cn: “ 随你的便吧, ” 她说, “ 来吧, 乔丹. ”

sentences.en: " Hello, Jordan,'she called unexpectedly. " Please come here. "
sentences.cn: “ 哈罗, 乔丹, ” 她出其不意地喊道, “ 请你过来. ”

sentences.en: " It's a swell suite, " whispered Jordan respectfully, and every one laughed.
sentences.cn: “ 这个套间真高级. ” 乔丹肃然起敬地低声说, 引得大家都笑了起来.

sentences.en: "I wish I did," said Phil Jordan, relapsing into his usual gloom.
sentences.cn: “我要是那样做了就好了，”菲尔·乔丹说道，又像往常一样消沉起来。

sentences.en: Falk even persuaded Nike to spend at least $ 1 million marketing Jordan, a gargantuan sum at the time.
sentences.cn: 福尔克甚至说服耐克公司至少花了100万美元去推销乔丹, 这在当时是一笔巨额款项.

sentences.en: Finally, the nurse was reunited with the soldier in Jordan.
sentences.cn: 终于, 这名护士和士兵在约旦重逢.

sentences.en: He had felt on the telephone that Jordan had a little nugget of information tucked away somewhere.
sentences.cn: 他已从电话里感到乔丹掖着点儿什么有价值的情报。

sentences.en: He left today on a roundabout route for Jordan and is also due soon in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 他今天启程绕道去约旦，用不了多久还会去埃及。

sentences.en: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Jordan.
sentences.cn: 他是约旦大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.en: Jordan promised to trim the city budget without cutting essential services.
sentences.cn: 乔丹承诺在不减少基本服务的前提下，缩减市政预算。

sentences.en: Jordan reopened its border with Iraq.
sentences.cn: 约旦重新开放了与伊拉克的边界。

sentences.en: Off to one side, Sticht, Macomber, Jordan, and Kreps huddled to discuss something.
sentences.cn: 施蒂希特、麦康伯、乔丹和克雷普斯走到一旁私下商量着什么。

sentences.en: The pipeline supplies Jordan with 15 per cent of its crude oil.
sentences.cn: 该管道供给约旦15%的原油.

sentences.en: Traffic from Jordan to Iraq is down to a dozen loaded lorries a day, compared with a high of 200 a day.
sentences.cn: 现在从约旦到伊拉克一天只有十几辆装货的卡车通过，而最高峰时可达到一天200辆。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 迈克尔·乔丹（美国篮球明星）

trans.tran_cn: 约旦（阿拉伯北部的王国），约旦河，(j-)<方>室内用便器，尿壶
